duties_responsibilities.duty: Performing tire service duties, including repairs, balancing, operating tire changers and handling air impact wrenches
Performing car service duties, such as lubrication, oil changes, basic vehicle inspections, and elemental mechanical tasks
Unloading and loading 20 to 100-pound items from trucks, maintaining service center standards of cleanliness, complying with company safety policy, and driving vehicles
Performing physical tasks related to tire service, oil changes, and miscellaneous duties
Working in varied work environments, including cold and hot conditions, and exposure to chemicals

education_certification.credential: Valid automobile driver’s license, and the ability to learn basic mechanical tasks
